cause.description:
Manbearpig is half man, half bear, and half pig. He doesn't care who you are, what you do, he WILL KILL YOU!
http://video.google.com/videoplay?docid=-2325515481541480328&q=manbearpig+south+park&hl=en
1. Manbearpig must be stopped
cause.mission: Stop the ultimate Threat of Manbearpig
cause.name: Help Prevent Manbearpig Attacks
